name: Dance, Bro!
description:
Dance, Bro! is a game created for the 2022 Lynx Jam.

Dance your way to internet stardom. Grab some love and dodge the haters. Catch some hearts and grab that fire for big points, but dodge everything else. If you get 10-points of social shaming, your game is over.  Rack up as many likes as you can before that happens. The game will auto-restart so you can try to beat your previous score.

Dance, Bro! is fairly easy at first but gets more difficult once you've gained 10 likes. Make it to 20 likes, and the difficulty will ramp up again.

The Controls

Up and down - Walk up and down

Left and right - Moonwalk

Button A - Do a split

Button B - Spin

Option1 - Disco Mode! (non-scoring)

Option2 - Exit Disco Mode

Credits

"Dance, Bro!" was created and coded by Steven (with his daughter Stephanie making critical contributions). I used the Karri/nop90 template. Many thanks to them as well as several others in the forums. You guys are the best. And thanks to Atari Gamer!
